lines.text: Don't worry honey, I'm as fit as Xena!
Beth, I saw your film.
What?
Let's just say it wasn't on the Disney Channel, that's for sure.
I can't believe he cheated on me!
He's a guy, what do you expect?
Happy Birthday baby!
Mother?
When did you go blonde?
Cory's a catch!
You make him sound like a fish.
The whole point of going to college is to snag a med student. You've already snagged a doctor!
Cory will be raking in the bucks faster than you can say rhinoplasty!

[trying to seduce Nick after buying him chicken for dinner]
I didn't know what you preferred. Thighs or breasts?

[completely unaware]
Wings.
It appears your credit card has been cancelled.

[angrily]
Oh, that bastard!

[in response to Laura and Christina entering the room]
This room is starting to smell! We'll wait down the hall.
You lying bitches!

[Matt walks into Laura's kitchen, shirtless, the morning after party. His presence is a surprise to Laura]
Matt?
You didn't say I couldn't have a houseguest.
You should go.
I will... later
[he kisses her]
If you wanna stay here and play Marcia Brady, then fine! I'm going to Malibu.

[following Laura and Christina's cat-fight at the birthday party]
Cake, anyone?

[completely naked and wet, covering herself with a towel]
Sir, I had no intention of being caught here in the state of undress.
Can you *ever* forgive me?
[drops her towel, letting her boss get a good look at her body]
